name.jp: ネオパープルロボット

description.en: This nimble little flying robot will faithfully trail behind you wherever you go!
description.ar: This nimble little flying robot will faithfully trail behind you wherever you go!
description.br: This nimble little flying robot will faithfully trail behind you wherever you go!
description.cns: This nimble little flying robot will faithfully trail behind you wherever you go!
description.de: Dieser wendige kleine Flugroboter wird dir treu folgen, wohin du auch gehst!
description.fi: This nimble little flying robot will faithfully trail behind you wherever you go!
description.fil: This nimble little flying robot will faithfully trail behind you wherever you go!
description.fr: Ce petit robot volant et agile vous suivra fidèlement partout où vous irez !
description.id: This nimble little flying robot will faithfully trail behind you wherever you go!
description.it: This nimble little flying robot will faithfully trail behind you wherever you go!
description.jp: この軽快な小さな空飛ぶロボットは、どこへ行ってもあなたの後ろを忠実に追跡します!

description.sp: ¡Este pequeño y ágil robot volador te seguirá fielmente dondequiera que vayas!
